name: Creamy Mushroom Chicken and Wild Rice Soup
description: Creamy Mushroom Chicken and Wild Rice Soup Recipe : A warm and creamy mushroom, chicken and wild rice soup that is down right one of the best comfort food around!
ingredients: 1 cup wild rice (or a blend of rice including wild rice)
1 1/2 cups chicken, cooked and diced or shredded
instructions: Melt the butter in a pan over medium-high heat, add the mushrooms and cook until the mushrooms have released their liquids and the liquid has evaporated, about 10-15 minutes, before setting aside. Melt the butter in the pan, add the onions, carrots and celery and cook until tender, about 8-10 minutes. Mix in the garlic and thyme and cook until fragrant, about a minute. Add the broth, rice, chicken and mushrooms, bring to a boil, reduce the heat and simmer, covered, until the rice is tender, about 20-30 minutes. Mix in the milk and cheese and cook until the cheese has melted, before seasoning with salt and pepper to taste.
